body:
Well, for starters, I'm not too much of an exotic person, despite my quirky personality. I've listed a majority of general answers to things people may be wondering about me in my 'about' section, so feel free to go and check that out if you wish. ;> 

Avicus wise, I've been a member of this server ever since late, late 2013, but I only started to really come into the jist of things at the very start of this year. I've made several buddies along the way so far, some of them feeling like I've known them for a lifetime. I'm honestly quite impressed by how far the server has come in terms of changes and the dedication gone into making it an enjoyable place for all ages. I've also been doing my best to embrace every single moment of experience here, whether its ingame or on TS. I look forward to seeing it continue to thrive furthermore.

A'right, now that that's out of the way, feel free to AMA. ^_^
body_tagged:

I've made several buddies along the way so far, some of them feeling like I've known them for a lifetime. I'm honestly quite impressed by how far the server has come in terms of changes and the dedication gone into making it an enjoyable place for all ages. I've also been doing my best to embrace every single moment of experience here, whether its ingame or on TS. I look forward to seeing it continue to thrive furthermore.

A'right, now that that's out of the way, feel free to AMA. ^_^
